indexes.name: users_company_id
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX users_company_id ON public.users USING btree (company_id)

indexes.name: users_email
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX users_email ON public.users USING btree (email)

indexes.name: users_email_key
indexes.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_email_key ON public.users USING btree (email)

indexes.name: users_is_active
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX users_is_active ON public.users USING btree (is_active)

indexes.name: users_pkey
indexes.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (id)

indexes.name: users_user_type
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX users_user_type ON public.users USING btree (user_type)

indexes.name: ip_user_view
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX ip_user_view ON public.view_tracking USING btree (ip_address, viewed_user_id)

indexes.name: job_view_type
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX job_view_type ON public.view_tracking USING btree (job_id, view_type)

indexes.name: unique_user_view
indexes.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_user_view ON public.view_tracking USING btree (viewer_id, viewed_user_id, view_type)

indexes.name: view_tracking_created_at
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX view_tracking_created_at ON public.view_tracking USING btree (created_at)

indexes.name: view_tracking_pkey
indexes.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX view_tracking_pkey ON public.view_tracking USING btree (id)

indexes.name: viewed_user_type
indexes.definition: CREATE INDEX viewed_user_type ON public.view_tracking USING btree (viewed_user_id, view_type)

indexes.name: work_experiences_pkey
indexes.definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX work_experiences_pkey ON public.work_experiences USING btree (id)
